example[0]: There’s a letter on its way to you.
example[1]: More changes are on the way.
example[2]: She should be on the way here by now.
example[3]: The ships were already on their way to the gulf
definition[2]: while going from one place to another
example[4]: I ran out of gas on my way to the airport.
example[5]: Guess who I bumped into on the way home.
definition[3]: while moving from one situation or part of your life to another
example[6]: Don’s had to change jobs several times along the way.
definition[4]: if someone has a baby on the way, they are pregnant
